sense.def:
To savour food or drink
pomeni, da jemo ali pijemo počasi, tako da začutimo polni okus jedi ali pijače in ob njem uživamo.

seg.quote: Meadows took a bite of meat, savoured it, and said, ‘Fantastic.’

sense.def:
To savour an experience
pomeni, da nam je dogajanje v veliko zadovoljstvo in da poskušamo pri tem kar najbolj uživati.

seg.quote: He leaned back into his seat, savouring the comfort.
